layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x34
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x34
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x18
      LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 386x18 [border: (1px solid #000000)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 384x16
          text run at (1,1) width 384: "Should not be monospace."
      LayoutBR {BR} at (386,0) size 0x18
